name: Milk-Man: Offroad Transporter Trailer Truck Drive
name_original: Milk-Man: Offroad Transporter Trailer Truck Drive
description:
Start the milk tanker truck engine & drive the powerful milk tanker. Milk-Man is one of the best liquid cargo transporter truck game which lets you enjoy milk tanker parking & driving simulator experience. Your duty is to make sure the milk supply remains continuous to offroad milk, chocolate, curd & cheese maker industry in town.

Challenge yourself to become an expert driver of this heavy milk transporter truck on hillside route. Milk-Man is a driving simulation game for you and the objective of this game is to drive from dairy milk farm to picking up milk and delivering milk to the offroad towns & milk industries. Your duty as cargo truck driver is to reach safely on destinations.

You need to fill your milk tanker from town dairy farms and drive to deliver different offroad town stations within time limits to meet the demand of city. You will drive this heavy duty milk transporter truck to its destinations with extra driving care and accuracy.

Features of Milk-Man include:

+ Unique Concept of Mountain Milk Transportation
+ Driving Experience of Heavy Dairy Farm Transporter Truck with Milk Tanker
+ Exciting Levels to Enjoy Milk Tanker Truck Driving
+ Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements
+ Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics
+ Play as a Virtual Milk Transport Truck Driver
+ Heavy Truck Driving Simulation with Smooth Steering & Hydraulic Brakes
+ Different Camera Angles to explore the 3D Offroad Environment
